title: David McCullough: "1776"
description: Michael's conversation with Pulitzer Prize winning author David McCullough, with his then-new book "1776." Original air date May 2005. The book was published on 24 May 2005.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, David McCullough)
